getActors.description: Gets the list of Actors available to the user.

getDatasetItems.description: Gets the data from an Actors run.

props.name: runid
props.description: The runid of the completed Actors run [defaultDatasetId] (compulsory)

getLastRun.description: Gets last run details for a given Actor.

props.name: actorid
props.description: The id [defaultDatasetId] of the Actor to get run information [you can also use the username then ~ then the name] (compulsory)

startActor.description: Starts an Apify Actor web scraper

props.name: actorid
props.displayName: The id or name of the Actor (alphanumeric)
props.description: The id of the Actor to run [Use either id, or the username then ~ then the name] (compulsory)

props.name: jsonbody
props.description: The JSON input to pass to the Actor [you can get the JSON from a run in your Apify account]. If left blank will use defaults. (optional)
